dcterms:creator: M. T. Kaufman
M. Churchland
S. I. Ryu
K. V. Shenoy
dcterms:description: The Maze datasets consist of recordings from primary motor and dorsal premotor cortices while a monkey made reaches with an instructed delay to visually presented targets while avoiding the boundaries of a virtual maze.
dcterms:title: MC_Maze

dcterms:creator: J. E. Oâ€™Doherty
M. M. B. Cardoso
J. G. Makin
P. N. Sabes
dcterms:description: This dataset contains sorted unit spiking times and behavioral data from a macaque performing a self-paced reaching task, where the subject reached between targets randomly selected from an 8x8 grid.
dcterms:title: MC_RTT

dcterms:creator: R. H. Chowdhury
J. I. Glaser
L. E. Miller
dcterms:description: This dataset contains sorted unit spiking times and behavioral data from a macaque performing a reaching task with perturbations, where the manipulandum applied a bump during the center hold prior to the reach.
dcterms:title: Area2_Bump

dcterms:creator: H. Sohn
D. Narain
N. Meirhaeghe
M. Jazayeri
dcterms:description: This dataset contains sorted unit spiking times from a macaque performing a time-interval reproduction task, where the monkey estimated a time interval between two visual cues and generated a matching interval by moving their eyes or hands.
dcterms:title: DMFC_RSG

dcterms:creator: M. Churchland
M. Kaufman
J. Cunningham
J. Foster
P. Nuyujukian
S. I. Ryu
K. V. Shenoy
dcterms:description: The scaled versions of the MC_Maze dataset, which consist of recordings from primary motor and dorsal premotor cortices while a monkey made reaches with an instructed delay to visually presented targets.
dcterms:title: MC_Maze-S

dcterms:creator: M. Churchland
M. Kaufman
J. Cunningham
J. Foster
P. Nuyujukian
S. I. Ryu
K. V. Shenoy
dcterms:description: The medium scaled version of the MC_Maze dataset, which consists of recordings from primary motor and dorsal premotor cortices while a monkey made reaches with an instructed delay to visually presented targets.
dcterms:title: MC_Maze-M

dcterms:creator: M. Churchland
M. Kaufman
J. Cunningham
J. Foster
P. Nuyujukian
S. I. Ryu
K. V. Shenoy
dcterms:description: The large scaled version of the MC_Maze dataset, which consists of recordings from primary motor and dorsal premotor cortices while a monkey made reaches with an instructed delay to visually presented targets.
dcterms:title: MC_Maze-L
